notes: mass noun; plural 'denari' used in literary or historical contexts
example_sentence_italian: Il denaro non compra la felicità.

notes: used to indicate an amount; uncommon in everyday speech
example_sentence_italian: Mi serve un denaro per riparare l'auto.
example_sentence_english: I need a sum of money to fix the car.

example_sentence_italian: Il denaro è importante per vivere.

notes: plural form, literary or historical; often means coins

example_sentence_italian: I denari sono conservati nel museo.
example_sentence_english: The coins are kept in the museum.

notes: partitive plural; also contraction of di + i

example_sentence_italian: Non credere nel denaro come unica soluzione.
example_sentence_english: Do not believe in money as the only solution.

example_sentence_italian: Ho letto un articolo sul denaro digitale.
example_sentence_english: I read an article about digital money.

example_sentence_italian: Col denaro puoi comprare molte cose.
example_sentence_english: With money you can buy many things.

example_sentence_italian: Ai denari antichi viene dato valore.
Dai denari trovati al mercato, molti sono falsi.
example_sentence_english: From the coins found at the market, many are fake.

example_sentence_italian: Non credo nei denari come unica misura.
example_sentence_english: I do not believe in money as the only measure.

example_sentence_italian: Ho letto articoli sui denari antichi.
example_sentence_english: I read articles about ancient coins.

example_sentence_italian: Coi denari raccolti abbiamo aiutato la famiglia.
example_sentence_english: With the money collected we helped the family.
